bye.title: Good Bye
bye.description: Hope to see your soon in our system.

email.title: Verification Email
email.description: It looks like your account hasn't passed the verification criteria.
email.confirmation: A verification email has been sent to your email. Please check your messages to continue certifying your email.

profile.title: Activation profile authorization
profile.description: Your profile has not been validated by your department administrator. Contact him to give you access to the system.

temporary.password.title: Password Temporary
temporary.password.description: It appears to be your first login with a temporary password. It must be changed to continue in the system.

tootlip.title: What does it mean ?
tootlip.description: These are users who have not yet/already changed the system-generated password to their own password.

tootlip.title: What does it mean ?
tootlip.description: These are users added by the administration of the organization / who have registered on the system themselves.

success.title: Login with your new password.
success.description: It is necessary logout to continue in Warehouse System.

changePassword.newPassword: Old password and new password cannot be the same. Try again.
changePassword.confirmPassword: Password and confirm password don't match. Try again.

timeout.title: Session timeout expiration
timeout.description: Sorry, you session in Warehouse System is expired. Try relogin again and come back.

insertUser.email: Email and Pec Email are the same. Please, Change another one and try again.
insertUser.phone: The Phone and Landline are the same. Please, Change another one and try again.

emailPec.title: Warning!
emailPec.description: A password recovery email address is required.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.empty: There are no notifications for the last 30 days.

success.description: You will be redirected to the login page in 5 seconds.

change.thirdText: Would you like to change with the status ?

logout.title: Confirmation Logout
logout.subtitle: Are you sure you want to logout ?

deleteUser.title: Confirmation Cancellation
deleteUser.subtitle: Are you sure you want to delete this user ?

cancel.title: Confirmation Cancel
cancel.subtitle: Are you sure you want to cancel this profil ?

insertUser.title: Confirmation Insertion
insertUser.subtitle: You have entered a PEC e-mail. A confirmation email will be sent to you in order to certify it. Are you sure you want to continue ?

check.title: Verification Email
check.subtitle: Your account hasn't been verified, please go to your email account and verify it

almost18YearsOld.title: Please confirm your age
almost18YearsOld.subtitle: Warehouse System, adults only.
almost18YearsOld.description: To confirm registration, the user must be at least 18 years old.

search.simple: Find by email or full name

confirm.password: Password and confirm password don't match. Try again.

validations.username: Username must be more than 7 characters. Try again.

upload.extensions: The extensions file allowed are: .jpg, .jpeg, .png, .gif, .tif, .tiff, .bmp, .webp. Try another file.
upload.size: The maximum uploading file size will be 5Mb. Try another file.

link.expiration: The link to reset your password is expired. Try to resend the new link to complete the operation.
link.date: The expired date that you are providing to reset your password is not correct. Try to resend the new link to complete the operation.

popover.title: Login Informations
popover.subtitle: In WareHouse System, it is possibile to login with :

popover.title: Checkbox « Remember »
popover.contentOne: Choosing « Remember » reduces the number of times you'll be asked to sign in on this device.
popover.contentTwo: To keep your account safe, use this option only on your devices.
popover.contentThree: Choosing this option, the system keeps your credentials login for 7 days.

landline.title: Secondary phone number
landline.required: Your secondary phone number is required

securePassword.title: For your password security, use one password that content a least:

content.title: Enter the email address associated with your account
content.subtitle: We will send a link to this address allowing you to easily reset your password.

success.title: We just sent you an email at:

content.one: This contains a link to reset your password.
content.three: Check the spelling of the address entered, or that the email is not in your spam folder.

success.title: We just sent you an email at:

content.one: This contains a link to verify your mail.
content.three: Check the spelling of the address entered, or that the email is not in your spam folder.

presentEmailPec.title: To complete your personal PEC email certification, you were required to enter the 6-digit code that was emailed to you.
presentEmailPec.subtitle: Didn't receive a code or your code has expired ?
presentEmailPec.description: The security of your personal information is essential. We therefore verify that you are indeed at the origin of this request.

notPresentEmailPec.form.title: From today, you can designate a recovery email address for your mailbox. If you forget your own email, you can simply choose a new one using the email address provided.
notPresentEmailPec.form.subtitle: We will send a verification code to the email address provided, so please male sure that you can access that mailbox to complete the procedure.

successEmailPec.title: Enhanced security of your space
successEmailPec.subtitle: Your PEC email address has been verified and validated to improve the security of your space on our system.
successEmailPec.descriptionOne: In case of problem with your main email address {{ email }}, you can use the PEC email address
successEmailPec.descriptionTwo: for all your operations on our system.

profile.title: My Profile

preferences.title: Preferences
preferences.subtitleTwo: Once you delete/disable your account, there isn't going back. Please be certain
preferences.description: I want to proceed the operation deletion or deactivation

modal.title: Are you sure you want to perform this action ?
modal.message.delete: Deleting your account, this will be unavailable for 90 days. Then after, it will be deleted definitive in warehouse system. In case you want to restore your account, contact your department organization.
modal.message.disabled: Disabling your account, it will not longer possible to login again. In case you want to restore your account, contact your department organization.

form.label: Enter your matricule to confirm the operation

profile.lastLoginMessage: You were last logged in WareHouse System on

popover.title: What is the Personal PEC Address
popover.contentOne: It is a secondary e-mail address, which can be used in case of need, together with the personal e-mail address.
popover.contentTwo: To be used, it must be certified (verified by the person).
